Full Syllabus - 36 Week Curriculum

Our comprehensive curriculum covers both Nepali language learning and cultural topics. The course is divided into three terms of 12 weeks each, offering a balanced approach to developing language skills while gaining knowledge about Nepal's rich culture and heritage.

Term 1

Week Topic View Details
Week 1 Welcome to Nepal - Location, Flag, and National Symbols View Lesson
Week 2 Geography of Nepal - Mountains, Hills, and Terai View Lesson
Week 3 The People of Nepal - Major Communities and Languages View Lesson
Week 4 Nepali Alphabet Introduction View Lesson
Week 5 Numbers 1-20 in Nepali View Lesson
Week 6 Dashain Festival - Nepal's Biggest Celebration View Lesson
Week 7 Tihar Festival - Festival of Lights View Lesson
Week 8 Holi - Festival of Colors View Lesson
Week 9 Buddha Jayanti - Birth of Buddha View Lesson
Week 10 Teej - Women's Festival View Lesson
Week 11 Mount Everest and Other Famous Peaks View Lesson
Week 12 Animals of Nepal - Snow Leopards, Tigers, and Rhinos View Lesson

Term 2

Week Topic View Details
Week 13 National Parks and Conservation View Lesson
Week 14 Rivers and Lakes of Nepal View Lesson
Week 15 Traditional Music and Instruments View Lesson
Week 16 Nepali Dance Forms View Lesson
Week 17 Traditional Dress - Daura Suruwal and Gunyu Cholo View Lesson
Week 18 Nepali Arts and Crafts View Lesson
Week 19 Nepali Food - Dal Bhat and Popular Dishes View Lesson
Week 20 Nepali Snacks and Street Food View Lesson
Week 21 Games Children Play in Nepal View Lesson
Week 22 Temples of Kathmandu Valley View Lesson
Week 23 Durbar Squares and Palace Architecture View Lesson
Week 24 Stupas and Buddhist Monuments View Lesson

Term 3

Week Topic View Details
Week 25 Traditional Nepali Houses View Lesson
Week 26 Transportation in Nepal View Lesson
Week 27 Sports in Nepal View Lesson
Week 28 Famous Nepali People View Lesson
Week 29 Stories and Folklore of Nepal View Lesson
Week 30 Important Historical Events View Lesson
Week 31 Weather and Seasons in Nepal View Lesson
Week 32 Mountains and Trekking Culture View Lesson
Week 33 Family Life in Nepal View Lesson
Week 34 Art of Making Traditional Items View Lesson
Week 35 Nepali School Life View Lesson
Week 36 Main Occupation of Nepal: Agriculture View Lesson
